body: Avicade has almost no one in it and it has only three games. I'm wondering if a game committee can be formed for avicade?

replies.body:
These are the gamemodes that were accepted.
Apocalypse
Assault      
Boat battles
Capture The Beacon ← Yayyy :D
Wolves vs Rabbits
Freeze-ish tag
Miscount

But they were never added, and the notes explaining the gamemodes are still on the Committee docs.

replies.body:
Well for starters the committees more or less did not properly do their job. I know the game committee was intended to bring unique games to Avicus at a rapid pace, but what ended up was a lot of miscommunication (apparently?).  Games were never meant to be accepted on the spot; any game with the possibility of being brought to Avicus would require the acceptance of a higher staff member, in addition to me with the OK to say it's possible to develop in Minecraft.

Regarding the OP, we are bringing new games to the Avicade and redesigning it a bit to incorporate a wider variety of possibilities for games. It's good to see some ideas being brought to the table and I'll be sure to keep them in mind and bring them up with the appropriate people.

@Tigor101, @kycrafft I don't see why I am required to respond to your kit ideas. I have very little say on what kits are on the servers because I don't think I would balance them properly. Popular kits will get the attention of the kit committee.

Edit: I've also never seen than document linked above... Again, goes to show the lack of communication I suppose.

Regarding the OP, we are bringing new games to the Avicade and redesigning it a bit to incorporate a wider variety of possibilities for games. It's good to see some ideas being brought to the table and I'll be sure to keep them in mind and bring them up with the appropriate people.

replies.body:
You're previous posts were all an effort to get the attention of me specifically, so I assumed otherwise.

"lack of feedback in general" - I beg to differ, your posts received lots of attention and feedback, just a few had less than 5 replies. Many had well above that.
